sentences.english: It surely ranks among the most valuable literary artifacts in America.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，它算得上美國最珍貴的文學遺產之一。

sentences.english: A diamond on a dunghill is a precious diamond still.
sentences.chinese: 糞堆上的鑽石仍然是珍貴的鑽石。

sentences.english: Ru handed down less than one hundred works, so very precious.
sentences.chinese: 汝窯傳世作品不足百件，因此非常珍貴。

sentences.english: A skilled worker who and engraves precious stones .
sentences.chinese: 一個和雕刻珍貴寶石的工人。

sentences.english: Many people do not know the vingue of time.
This is a silk book, from which some valuable information was found.
sentences.chinese: 這是一本帛書，從這本書裏我們發現了珍貴的信息。

sentences.english: A special thank you to Moni for sharing these historic and precious photos with us.
sentences.chinese: 特別感謝您莫尼與我們一起分享這些珍貴的歷史照片。

sentences.english: He showed his friends the precious stamps which he has collected these years.
sentences.chinese: 他把這些年來所蒐集的珍貴郵票拿給朋友看。

sentences.english: The organizer put many valuable works of calligraphy, and paintings up for auction.
sentences.chinese: 這次拍賣會的主辦方會拿出多件珍貴的字畫參拍。

sentences.english: In the light of together with happiness, just more precious.
sentences.chinese: 平平淡淡之中的攜手與幸福，才更珍貴。

sentences.english: A lot of precious historical relics are displayed in Xiangfan Museum.
sentences.chinese: 襄樊博物館展出了許多珍貴的歷史文物。

sentences.english: The magic brought valuable gifts, but that was not among them.
sentences.chinese: 麥琪帶來了珍貴的禮物，但是其中沒那樣東西。

sentences.english: It gives you a sense of the finiteness of your life, the preciousness of your life.
sentences.chinese: 它可以使你認識到生命的有限，和生命的珍貴。

sentences.english: Use form of diary to record valuable inspiration works of Rainstorm.
sentences.chinese: 以日記的形式記錄了陳藝珍貴的靈感創作。

sentences.english: That old book is my most precious possession.
sentences.chinese: 那本舊書是我最珍貴的財產。

definition: unique and unmatched (idiom); unrivalled/nothing compares with it
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
rare/not familiar (to the speaker)/sth rarely experience/hard to see
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
